Description:
Detects exploitation attempt using public exploit code for CVE-2018-15473

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: SSHD Error Message CVE-2018-15473
Query: sourcetype='linux-sshd' eql select * from _source_ where log like '%error: buffer_get_ret: trying to get more bytes 1907 than in buffer 308 [preauth]%'
